rows.label: tlk70000024_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Mo! Spiky-birds with big-huge wings
come and make shambles!

rows.label: tlk70000024_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Even Ryuuryuu and band of Nopon
outlaws not that naughty!

rows.label: tlk70000024_02_msg0003
rows.name:
If spiky-birds come back, Ryuuryuu show
them what for!

rows.label: tlk70000024_02_msg0004
rows.name:
But what can spiky-birds want? What
good it serve to destroy town?

rows.label: tlk70000024_02_msg0005
rows.name:
Mo? Stole seal of Iira?!
That serious crime! Very bad.
